caption.title: IFA of ovaries and oocytes dissected from females infected with DENV2 after second gonotrophic cycle.
caption.p: A. Microscopy images of ovaries of Groups I and II from control (left) and DENV2 infected females (right), showing infected ovaries and oviducts. B. Microscopy images of single oocytes from Group II females infected with DENV2. Arrows denote IFA positive germarium and follicles. DAPI signal (blue) and DENV2 antigen (FITC/green).
